entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Churchill Falls
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
